name: Gold Addons for Elementor
author: GoldAddons

sections.description:
The Gold Addons plugin extends the capabilities of the Elementor page builder by introducing a new set of widgets.

Right now we have a 16 awesome widgets:

FREE Widgets (9)

  • Alert Widget
  • Blog Widget
    • Blog Grid Layout
    • Blog Timeline Layout
    • Blog Small Thumbs Layout
    • Blog Infinite Scroll
    • Blog Load More Button
  • Contact Form 7 Widget
  • Countdown Widget
  • Image Carousel Widget
  • Modal Widget
  • Price Box Widget
  • Progress Bar Widget
  • Team Widget

PRO Widgets (7)

  • Accordion Widget
  • Portfolio Widget
  • 3D Flip Box Widget
  • Advanced Maps Widget
  • Facebook Feed
  • Image Difference
  • Typed

We are preparing many new widgets with every single update.

GoldAddons.com Website
sections.installation:
The installation of Gold Addons for Elementor plugin is very simple:

  1. Upload gold-addons-for-elementor folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
Can GoldAddons work with Gutenberg?

Not right now but maybe that will be possible one day.
sections.changelog:
1.3.2 – 14 Aug, 2024

  • Fixed minor incompatibility with PHP 8.2
  • Replaced a waypoint usage with intersection observer in progress bar widget.

1.3.10 – 05 Apr, 2024

  • Fixed minor issue.

1.3.0 – 04 Apr, 2024

  • Fixed possible XSS hole.
  • Updated some parts of the code to be up to date with the Elementor.

1.2.9 – 19 Feb, 2024

Added new “Progress bar” widget.

1.2.8 – 16 Feb, 2024

  • Minor changes.

1.2.7 – 15 Feb, 2024

  • Added new “Countdown” widget.

1.2.6 – 06 Feb, 2024

  • Minor changes.

1.2.5 – 06 Feb, 2024

  • Minor changes.

1.2.4 – 21 December 2023

  • Minor changes.

1.2.3 – 21 December 2023

  • Minor changes.

1.2.2 – 02 June 2022

  • Added new PRO widget (Typed)
  • Minor changes

1.2.1 – 23 May 2022

Minor fixes.

1.2.0 – 23 May 2022

  • Updated compatibility with Elementor
  • Fixed minor bugs

1.1.9 – 23 May 2022

  • Updated minor bug

1.1.8 – 08 July 2021

  • Added Advanced Maps (PRO) widget.
  • Minor changes.

1.1.7 – 5 July 2021

  • Fixed license validation bug.

1.1.6 – 05 July 2021

  • Updated compatibility with Elementor 2.8.0 and above.

1.1.5 – 04 March 2021

  • Added Contact Form 7 widget.
  • Updated a deprecated functions.
  • Updated plugin POT translation file.
  • Optimized the code.
  • Fixed alert widget FA icons not showing.
  • Fixed blog widget grid layout and infinite scroll bug.
  • Fixed price box widget list item FA icons not showing.
  • Fixed team widget FA icons not showing.

1.1.4 – 11 September 2020

  • Added GoldAddons Pro plugin updater class.
  • Fixed collapse jQuery conflicts with some themes.

1.1.3 – 18 March 2020

  • Fixed minor jQuery compatibility issues with some themes.
  • Fixed bug where GA removes Elementor WordPress & Smart Slider widgets.

1.1.2 – 11 March 2020

  • Added Alert widget.
  • Updated translation .POT file.

1.1.1 – 27 February 2020

  • Minor fixes.

1.1.0 – 27 February 2020

  • Minor fixes.

1.0.9 – 27 February 2020

  • Minor fixes.

1.0.8 – 27 February 2020

  • Optimized some parts of the plugin.
  • Minor dashboard panel design changes.

1.0.7 – 20 May 2019

  • Added blog content wrapper shadow styling feature.
  • Added show / hide post tags feature.
  • Added enable / disable read more link feature.
  • Fixed blog post title typography issue on some themes.
  • Updated plugin .pot file.

1.0.6 – 19 May 2019

  • Updated blog widget with more styling features.

1.0.5 – 17 May 2019

  • Minor code changes.
  • Updated plugin pot file.

1.0.4 – 18 January 2019

  • Added upgrade features into admin dashboard.

1.0.3 – 02 December 2018

  • Added Blog Posts Widget.

1.0.2 – 17 September 2018

  • Added Price Box Widget.

1.0.1 – 13 September 2018

  • Added Team Widget.

1.0.0 – 12 September 2018

  • Initial Release
